org.apache.ignite.ml.tree

Class DecisionTree<T extends ImpurityMeasure<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.DatasetTrainer<DecisionTreeNode,Double>
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.DecisionTree<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of impurity measure.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DecisionTreeClassificationTrainer, DecisionTreeRegressionTrainer

    public abstract class DecisionTree<T extends ImpurityMeasure<T>>
extends DatasetTrainer<DecisionTreeNode,Double>
    Distributed decision tree trainer that allows to fit trees using row-partitioned dataset.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.DatasetTrainer
